original_text: Or with princes that had gold, who filled their houses with silver:
korean_text: 혹시 금을 가지며 은으로 집을 채운 고관들과 함께 있었을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Or with princes that had gold
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 금을 가진 왕자들과 함께 있거나

sentences.original_text: who filled their houses with silver
